'''Wehata''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

Wehata is the daughter of weaver [Rongi](/rongi/). She is located within the [Kuaru hut](/kuaruHut/) in Tikawara.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           =
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved = [Plucked Fruit](/pluckedFruit/)
|none            = 
|other           =
}}

## =Quests

=
* [Plucked Fruit](/pluckedFruit/) - Wehata has some information on [Rongi](/rongi/) that can help solve the mystery of who stole the [Koīki Fruit](/koikiFruit/).
[Category:Tikawara characters](/categoryTikawaraCharacters/)
